content.detailedDescription:
I was having a smoke, by myself, on the roof of my apartment building and saw this prominent orange orb moving in the sky. i had had a couple beers earlier, but can assure you i had my wits about me.

it caught my eye because i had seen orbs like this before in ct a few years earlier. it looked very similar to the orbs i'd seen before because of its color, size, and movement. that event, however, was different in that there were more identical orbs making even stranger motions in the sky.

the event lasted only a minute. i took out my phone after a few seconds of staring in disbelief, and incredibly, my phone said it's memory was full and wouldn't let me take photo or video. i looked up a couple times in the process of trying to delete memory from my phone, and i saw it slowly progressing across the sky over my head, but when i finally got my phone's camera ready, it had faded away and disappeared.

i looked in the other direction but did not see it re-appear. for a couple minutes, i kept an eye on the same spot in the sky where it initially appeared and did not see anything else. i noticed the distinctive lights of airplanes in the sky after the event, which were clearly different from what i'd just seen, so that reaffirmed the reality if the situation. the object's flight-path was straight, oddly sluggish, and it eventually, and slowly, faded into the black of the night sky, around 80 degrees from the horizon.

it seemed like it was flying at a similar altitude to airplanes that i've observed regularly flying around the city. 

there seemed to be the slightest outline of a light orange rectangle inside of the orange glow of the orb, too. it seemed far away and difficult to make out, but it looked like two squares connected to form a rectangle, or just a rectangle with a line running through it, dividing it into two equal squares.
content.summary: I was having a smoke on the roof of my apartment building and saw this prominent orange orb moving in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard when i noticed one object hovering above me, began filming when second object joined and appeared to flash signals at first object. first object appeared to cloak in and out while flying away.
content.summary: I spotted sphere hovering above me, then second sphere joined before flying away fast

content.detailedDescription:
Walking my dog
planes overhead and clouds
i thought it was a red tower beam
it flashed red bright and it just hovered
i was surprised my wife came out to witness and it turned all blue and started hovering away and maybe decended
content.summary: Slow hover red flash approach then paused and then went back

content.detailedDescription: i walked out of my house , an stood on the front steps of my porch . an i saw these four, huge square shaped bright, yellow lights slowly approaching the field . i knew it was a u.F.O . it hovered over the field , close to the street , across from my house .It was on he left an then the lights whent off for about a few seconds . an then came back on again  , and it was over to the right side this time!. no sound came from it at all!. i think they noticed i noticed them . i just stood still stareing at this u.F.O for over a minute wondering what it was doing.I was not scared ,and i wanted to go looking for it after it was gone. this u.F.O was big ,4 of my nieghbors saw it too. it was not even that far up in the sky!. then it just turned and took off like the speed of lightning,no sound either,it was just gone !.
content.summary: I saw a u.F.O , barely in the sky . it had 4 squared bright , yellow lights and it made no sound at all, it was in a shape of a circle . then it just took off.

content.detailedDescription: I've been sitting on these photos for a while for various reasons.  as soon as i started documenting the geoengineering activities laying waste to the skies, anomalous objects started appearing that i had trouble comprehending.  pulsating lights, silver orbs floating in sky, appearing and disappearing, and this object, which i still cannot identify.  a friend of a friend also saw the same thing about a mile away from my location.  drone?  i don't know.  never seen a shapeshifting drone before.  the object was completely silent unlike a noisy drone.  it was pitch black and moved swiftly, horizontally.  i was taking pictures of the sky when the object emerged into view from behind a tree.  all photos taken at 20:25 est from elmwood and lafayette avenue with zoomed in screen shots following original photos.  notice the change in shape of object from first appearance to later photos.
content.summary: Black conical domed ufo floats over elmwood village, buffalo, ny july 11, 2015

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from work and as i turned the corner i saw this thing just hovering above the light pole so i stopped the car in the middle of the street and just stared at it it was rectangular and i could see these people or what ever you want to call them looking out the window they looked like humans only they had white hair it hovered above the light pole for a few minutes then shot up into the air it scared me so bad that i have never really told anyone about it i don't know what kind of witness i can be considered but i know what i saw that day
content.summary: It was hovering above a light pole

content.detailedDescription:
On my way into work 12/18/2015 at 6:45am i saw something strange. i live in weston, florida and take 595 east into davie. if i kept going on 595 it would take me passed the airport and then into ft. lauderdale. passed that the atlantic ocean. 

every once in a while i see this smoke trail in the distance that goes straight up. it is always in the same spot around the same time. i observe this being made and it always seems weird. it looks like it is well beyond the airport. it may be a plane taking off, climbing and headed out over the ocean, like i know they do, but i work really close to the airport and like i said it is way out there in the distance.

this morning was different. as i watched the single smoke trail going straight up it ended. then if you took your thumb and forefinger about 7 inches away from the end of the trail, there was a bright yellow orange dot that lasted about a minute. i have no idea how far that is at that distance away from me, a few thousand feet? it looked like it went behind some whispy clouds and vanished. the light followed the same smoke trail going straight up. it was just weird, i follow you guys on fb and thought i'd report it.

i was driving and in traffic so no picture.
content.summary: Smoke trail going straight up, then a space a then bright dot appeared

content.detailedDescription: i was at work outside and i looked up and saw what appear to be a triangle, pyramid sucking in the clouds surrounding it it was roughly at 11oclock or 85 degrees in the north east sky it was roughly at an altitude of 10,000 feet and was roughly 300ft wide. i grabbed my camera and snapped photos that i need someone to see.
content.summary: I believe ive discovered an anomoly

content.detailedDescription:
It was late summer and i was chilling in the balcony with the cool summer breeze.Then after some hours,i noticed something flashing and hovering in the sky.My thoughts were at first that it was an airplane,but then i noticed that it stood and did go forward.The ufo was hovering and didn't emit any sound,but it was emitting strange lights randomly like white,red,blue.It then proceeded to descend into the air very slowly.My first sight at the ufo was that i was shocked.I never ever have seen a ufo in my life and now i did.I was still observing the ufo and to my surprise,it doesn't go away until the next morning. 

 now the strangest part of this is that 1 week before the sighting,my mom saw a black helicopter escorting what looks to me like a military airplane or something.There were total 3 witnesses who saw the ufo:me,my mom and my school bro who saw the same light in his house garden.Other than that,i have a very strange thing to say:



                          i see it everyday,the same spot,the same house.
content.summary: Flashing lights near our house.Weeks before,saw a black helicopter.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking alone from my shop after work yesterday evening around 7pm to main house when i saw 6-8 orange lights, like small orange balls, in a line as if they were planes in a row, in the western sky. i thought at first these were planes that took off from san jose, but that would be too far and over mountains, but i really dont know. after a few minutes these object no longer stayed in line, but dispersed in different directions and then faded away. one orange ball stayed bright for a few minutes longer, but it too eventually disappeared, just faced away.
i couldn't think of anything that could account for these lights except maybe some kind of military technology that was dropped from a plane possibly.
i was feeling a little excited that i was seeing something rare,, 
if there is an explanation i would like to know what it was.
content.summary: I saw a line of 6-8 orange lights in the western sky, heading southeasterly,

content.detailedDescription: I was working looked out my window and saw what seemed to be a rocket launch..Acceptno launch sits near my area what soever. my coworker said i hope its not a missel. it launched way up high into sky them after it reached way above cloud level it started moving east right over us and a very rapid speed. much faster that a plane.
content.summary: Rocket type shooting straight up in the sky then shooting acroos in rapid speed

content.detailedDescription: I was working looked out my window and saw what seemed to be a rocket launch..Acceptno launch sits near my area what soever. my coworker said i hope its not a missel. it launched way up high into sky them after it reached way above cloud level it started moving east right over us and a very rapid speed. much faster that a plane.
content.summary: Rocket type shooting straight up in the sky then shooting acroos in rapid speed

content.detailedDescription: Witness (a) lives in ludington mi right on hamlin lake.  “about 2 years ago my girlfriend and i witnessed a star like object that was jetting back and forth, stopping on a dime, then up and down and then went backwards again, then finally took off out of sight at crazy speeds.  since then we, well mostly me, have been paying attention.  i have seen many “moving stars” but none as fast as that first one.  so i kind of gave up until last summer on calm evenings and nights i began to hear what sounds like pulsating emp’s in your eardrum coming from across the lake in the miles of uninhabited sand dunes.  when it first starts out it almost sounds like you can hear your own heartbeat but as it peaks in intensity it is clear for about 10 minutes to the point you can point at the direction it is coming from as sounds travel great across a lake.  i have pointed it out to mother and girlfriend and they are just as baffled. it started last summer and haven’t heard it because i have not been outside much lately, especially at night.  also the fall time is almost always windy around here, which blocks out noise well, but the other night was calm and i went outside and seemed like the sound has even grown in intensity since last summer.  just think someone should check it out cause it is unlike anything i have ever heard and doesn’t go with any technology i know of."
content.summary: Sound: “witness hears what sounds like pulsating emps in eardrum.”

content.detailedDescription: Dark night was landed but no intent to hurt others then took off never saw it agiian
content.summary: Red blue lights not threating

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: On the night of monday, december 14 2015 a good friend of mine and myself decided to check out the meteor shower that was supposedly going to be the biggest of the year. we left calgary, alberta heading west out of the city towards canmore/kananaskis country. we stopped a few places a couple mins off the highway each time and watched the meteors until we went to our final location down the highway a bit more. we watched the meteors for another 20-25 mins and were almost ready to leave because we were really cold. we wanted to see one more meteor before we left, when my friend saw a couple over his shoulder which drew our gaze to the west/northwest direction. we stared in that direction waiting for another meteor when i thought i noticed a white light in the sky move. i stared at it for another 10-15 seconds and thought maybe i just imagined it when it moved again. i kept my gaze on it thinking it was maybe a satellite, but it couldn't have been because it was completely still until it moved up and down again. i quickly brought it to my friends attention and as soon as we both started watching it, it started moving up and down and side to side in a very sporadic way. shortly after we were staring at this light he noticed two dimmer lights, one to the left and one above and to the left making a perfect triangle with the bright one on the right hand side. all 3 danced perfectly in sync with each other when we both noticed you could see the outline and the shape of a triangle/pyramid floating in the sky. it was around 9pm so it was pitch black outside and the moon was covered by fog/clouds so there wasn't much light in the sky. even with it being so dark we both easily noticed a different shade of black to the sky exactly where the pyramid was floating, we even looked away multiple times and back and could easily recognize the full 3 dimensional shape floating in the sky without hesitation. we were both in awe and kind of freaked out at the same time but could not stop watching it. i pulled my phone out and tried to capture it but it was so dark outside and the object had to be roughly 5-10 kilometers away but from what we could tell the size of it was huge. we watched it for roughly 1-2 minutes moving around, until it stopped. we then watched it for another 3-4 minutes before deciding to leave as we were freezing cold at this point. we talked about it on the drive back to calgary, and we both noticed how it was definitely a 3 dimensional object as one of the faces we could see was pointing south and the other was pointing east and we were facing north-west looking at the direct corner of it.
content.summary: Massive floating pyramid

content.detailedDescription: 03:00 dec 18 2015, out for smoke on porch a humming vibration sound then a ball of light flew over porch toward south,could have taken off from ground next to me, not sure. did not seem to be meteor.Sept. 15th saw disk at same location.
content.summary: Second event at residence, white orb flew over me this time.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my back deck around 12.10pm yesterday.  having had an encounter with a vulture the previous week, i was watching a pair who were flying high above my house, hanging on the air currents.
 facing northwest.  light, puffy clouds.  sunny day.  
as i was watching, a helicopter with navy tail markings, (possible tv copter or private), came up behind me from the southeast, moved north and turned in front of me, now heading due  west.
as i was watching, i noticed an "airplane" which was very high up headed west to east.  i thought this was unusual as most high planes in our area are on a n/s trajectory.  most commercial don't usually west to east, if any, local to our airport, vero beach, fl.
as i was watching the "plane", which was rose gold colored reflecting the sun behind it, it suddenly did a 180 and doubled back on its previous course.  that really got my attention.  i had no phone to record and i just watched. 
as it retraced about half of its course, it suddenly stopped, started becoming silver, glowing like an ice cream cone and just started dropping down getting bigger and brighter, out of the sky, silver trail behind it and half way down it just totally disappeared.  vanished.
i live south of cape canaveral and have witnessed nearly all shuttle and satellite launches for the past 20 years.  i have seen military planes but i never saw anything double back on itself then pouf, dropping like bright silver.
this is my first sighting of this type of object.
in 2006, i reported a large triangular craft which passed directly overhead the morning that one of the shuttles was due to return to florida at 6.30am.
people do not talk about ufos in this town although many have seen anomalies.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I was watching birds, a helicopter crossed path & i saw an "airplane" going west to east ..

content.detailedDescription:
The incident occurred during a summer night in 1975.  i am an army veteran and a college graduate...No issues with mental illness or drugs..So..

i awoke to noise outside our apartment window..From my bed, which i shared with my wife, i saw blinking or pulsating yellow/orangish lights outside..They appeared to be 30 or so feet away..The noise could be described as humming or vibrating...The object was not in my sight line.  the light it was putting out was bright, but not affecting our room..Sort of aimed past it or just getting lighter and brighter.

i had a strange sensation and felt unable to move, react or respond...Almost like a paralysis.  i felt myself being lifted off the bed...I remember saying something to the effect of "uh oh, here we go..." and suddenly i dropped.

later, i just believed it to be a dream..That type of dream is common, i have read.  i wrote off the lights as the garbage men (not sure how i came up with that one) and realized i could not have been "levitated" out the window (which were open) due to the screens.

but at some point, i read about people actually finding themselves outside after some type of contact, and they had screens, too.  then the garbage men theory i had somehow come up with to rationalize my memory of the noise and lights made no sense...They never would have worked at night like that.  the last bit of information which made it even stranger was relating it to my wife...She said when i made the comment in bed, she reached to comfort me and i was up 12 to 16 inches in the air, but dropped when she grabbed me.

so there it is...For some reason, she is uncomfortable talking about it and refuses to rehash or discuss it anymore.  we did relate the story to a small group of friends about 12 or so years ago, during a discussion about strange occurances...But this is the only other time i have shared my story.
content.summary: Object out of sight...Blinking or pulsating lights

content.detailedDescription: I was returning to work in the afternoon. there were some really beautiful cloud banks southeast of my location. i snapped a photo, and didn't realize until i downloaded them that evening that the object was there. once i saw the picture, i was hoping that someone here would be interested in seeing the photo. i had seen a ufo in this vicinity years ago, as well.
content.summary: I actually didn't see the object until i downloaded pictures that i had taken that day.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 9 a.M. i was driving on the commodore barry bridge heading towards pennsylvania when i looked up and saw what would look like a human figure flying through the air in the same direction i was traveling before disappearing in the clouds.
content.summary: Flew east to west briefly before disappearing in clouds

content.detailedDescription: My buddy and i were at sole uno (spa & wellness) in rheinfelden, switzerland. outside in the swimming pool i looked up the sky (which i do often) and i saw a very bright star. when i pointed it out to my friend, it started to move (from left to right - north to east). it was too fast to be an airplane (afterwards we compared it with airplanes - there is an airport nearby in basel) and also to bright. there was no sound, it was a bright white star-like light (not white-red like airplanes). when we looked at it flying in a straight line from north to east, at the end (in the east) it suddenly with a very high velocity shoot straight up and we saw it getting smaller within 3 to 4 seconds, and then it was gone.
content.summary: Star-like appearance

content.detailedDescription: I had been out with 2 lady friends to some isolated juke joints,in macon and tallapoosa,and lee counties.We had several beers apiece over the course of about 7 hours.We were not drunk.I had maybe 6 but over as i said 7 hours.We came to my place a small mobile home in a clearing surrounded by woods.My driveway was about 100 feet long.Upon stopping i was standing outside the camero saying goodnight and i turned to the right laughing at a joke and saw a ball of green light on the ground in a unplanted corn field coming fast toward us.I instinctively looked straight up an saw a emerald green orb moving at a tremendous speed about 300 feet above the ground.It was by us and gone in a second orless.I said "did you see that".She had not because she was inside the car.Neither lady saw it.I did.No sound.Not anything.The orb was emitting the light to the ground,though i only saw the light in the field because as i said i looked up and saw the orb and it was gone.I have no physical proof.I just know what i saw.The ladies when told laughed it off.I do not know what it was but i did see it.It was totally quite out because of the hour and semi remote location.The orb had no sound,not even a swish.It was traveling at a tremendous rate of speed.
content.summary: Standing with friends in yard.Saw a green ball of light on ground.Looked up,saw green orb and it was gone.

content.detailedDescription: There's more to my story i didn't disclose, after i pointed a laser at the object it pointed a light back off white, heavy feeling when i felt it and like the video i tried sending that contained a virus my game system, security system and computers are all infected and corrupt if you have received any info on what that might of been i would like to know and since have talked to many more that witnessed the same object at the same time
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright light after explosion and power loss

content.detailedDescription: Early morning outside to catch view of space station fly over, looking to south waiting for first site of station fly over not knowing what to expect, then i saw what appeared to be a strange site it appeared as four fluorescent x's in a rectangle shape with the x's pulsating with bright yellow round lights at the x's corners flashing, made no sound, no vapor trail either, i was amazed because it was below the clouds, because i thought is that the station ? due to it being below the clouds i knew it couldn't be the station, i was in kind of a shock state because i have never seen anything like it and i have observed various types of aircraft in flight, upset that i didn't have a camera to log the event, and being alone i didn't have anyone to agree to my siting, so i drew a picture of what i saw, there were no other planes or any type of aircraft in the area. it continued straight north and went out of site.
content.summary: Went to view space station fly over and saw ufo

content.detailedDescription: I woke up to smoke at 2:45am on 12-13-2015. i know what time it was because icheck my phone when i get up. i get dressed my shoes get a sweater from my closet fine my lighter. i go outside and deside to head to the street and take a look around because someone tried to steal my neighbors licenses plate this week.As i'm walking in my front yard i look up to the sky south-southwest and see 3 flat round donut-washer. perfect circles .The centers were perfect circles as well. the center circle was not illuminated and the outside one was twice as big as the center with a white-grayish and a little bit of yellow light. the lights were not very bright at all. all 3 were exactly the same size,  color and traveling at the same speed. their was 1 in front the 2nd was about 600-1000yds behind in a straight line and the 3rd was 700yds west of the 1st and 2nd and about 400yds from the 2nd "behind"object and  the 300yds  from the 1st object "in front". i'm still seconded guessing myself on what i'm looking at. then it hits me. so i run inside and grab my phone to take video. my phone clock was 2:53 am when i looked at it out side . they continued to head north the 3rd object moved closer to the 1st"front"object . it was quick and i tried to take video and pictures but i was to amazed. their was a bright light at the end of the apartment complex next to my place. they disappeared into the clouds and the security light was to big to see passed.
content.summary: 3 perfect circle objects lit with grey white and a little yellow that had perfect circle in the center that  had no lite that i could see . they were shaped like a washer are a donut. they came from s-sw and headed n-nw  .

content.detailedDescription:
Estaba hablando con mi cuñado cuando vimos 4 luces de frente en la ruta de los aviones cuando cambio de velocidad y de altura pasando por encima de las casa a 1 cuadra de donde estaba mirando vi un artefacto plateado brillante mucha luz y tenia en el medio como entradas y salidas divididas de color dorado como un filtro de aire de autos viejos después fue rumbo a montevideo en ese momento sale un helicóptero del aeropuerto.
lo cual lo ve de frente y decide esquivarlo regresando al aeropuerto. en eso vemos que el objeto aterriza en un campo que esta al sur de mi localización. después vemos otra luz verde azul y rojas que vienen de frente hacia nosotros,solo se veía la luz, no reflejaba la luz el ruido a transformador a electromagnetismo  lo vimos pasar ir y venir a diferentes alturas y diferentes velocidades y otros objetos en forma de bumerán. duro como 3 horas todas las luces.
content.summary: Experiencia sobrenatural muchas luces y pensamientos encontrados

content.detailedDescription: Found in a foto i took in october (taken in gran canaria ) i didnt look at the foto until weeks later and noticed something on the centre right that just didnt look right ..Well it really looks like person but the head is kinda wierd as you,ll see...I went back a few weeks later and checked a few details ..Hieght of the rocks behind "it" etc and positioning....I calculate if it is ideed a "humaoid" to be no more than 120cm tall..Going of the rocks in the background wich are sweeping backwards at a shallow angle...Im sure theres no way they could have caused the shadow(check out the angle of the sun in the full original version)in the shape of a person or whatever...Just wierd .
content.summary: Humanoid/person caught in foto
content.locationName: Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Canarias

content.detailedDescription: Firstly all the above dates and times are approximate but close. i was sitting out at the end of the drive were it meets the back garden so i have the wall of the house on the right of me and a six foot garden fence on the left. wit trees and bushes in front of the fence, i had just finished looking trough a small telescope and decided to sit down for a while and just look around at the small amount of night sky visible between the house and fence. it was a few years ago but remember it well, sudden and fast the object appeared, and just hovered, oblong and 4 or 5 small windows brightly lit, i was mesmerised and didn't and couldn't take my eyes off of it and as fast as it appeared it disappeared, but while it was visible it seemed to me that every thing around me froze, it was like time stood still. no movement at all, bushes motionless and it was just me and the object and all in a couple of seconds, i think !! funny thing is that after it had gone i could not explain to friends how large or small it was, or how far or near it was, it just was.
content.summary: Hovering above for a few seconds then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 5:00 am on the morning of december 16 2015 i happened to wake up in bed feeling nausea's. after a couple of minutes later i heard this loud amplified jet like sound radiating inside of our house. it was so loud that my mother woke up terrified of the sound, shouting to my uncle across the house to wake up because of this extremely loud machine/hydraulic truck like sound radiating inside of our house. now when i heard my mom i replied by telling her it was a street sweeper truck outside. she then went down stairs while this horrifying sound was still occurring to check outside of the house and and while she opened the door she reported that the sound was entirely gone. now at this time around 5:00 am it is unlikely for our neighborhood street sweep to clean early in the morning. they come on the second or third week of each between 11:00 am to 3:00pm. and if it was a truck outside it is impossible to sound that loud inside of our house, no one was outside at that time as my mom reported. later that morning i didn't think about it an nor did my mom until later that after noon with it rang a bell in my mind that whatever happened that early morning was bizzare and unusual. i started to add the pieces together and i came to a conclusion that i was under the control of the aliens, that they made me believe it was a street sweeper outside when there was no such thing during that time of 4:45am to 5:00am on decmember 16 2015.I also beleive that the heavy machinary like sound that occurred inside of my house for 3 minutes was actually their flying saucer, it was partially entering our house. and as my uncle being an alien abtuctee he confirmed when i explained the sound to him that he said their flying saucer was inside of our house. now when my mom tired to wake him up he couldn't wake up and fell right back asleep. my mother and i witness this amplified sound inside of our house then after few minutes it was gone and the house became silent.
content.summary: My mother and i woke up to an amplified jet like sound inside of our house. it persisted for 3 minutes. it was extremely loud, like a hydraulic truck lifting tons of weight inside our house.

content.detailedDescription:
1.  i was outside having a cigarette at about 1:30am approximately.
2. i was looking up at the sky and i noticed a very bright twinkling star (blue and white intermittently) at an arms length it looked to be about 1/4", which is a lot larger than any star. i thought that it may have been a shooting star, but there was no tail, and it was slower than a shooting star, from where i was standing looking up, i had a field of vision of approximately 80deg to 15deg. it took the object about 2 seconds to pass my field of view, a lot slower than a shooting star and a whole lot faster that any airplane. also there was no "tail" like a shooting star would have. it flew overhead at a bearing of about 290deg. there was no sound, no deviation in direction. i don't want to go on a rant here, although i know that it definitely was not an airplane, i have lived here long enough to know that the last plane of the night is before 10:00pm, and they approach the airport in a northerly direction. it was too bright as well to be an airplane and far far to fast, on the other hand it was far to slow for a meteor, and like i said there was no tail, just a bright alternating light from blue to white. for example, if  you look at orion in the late night, look at the left foot, then down and to the left at about -25deg there is a twinkling blue star. that is what this looked like exactly, just hundreds of times larger. at first when i saw it i did not think much about it until later the next day. i looked all over the internet to explain what i saw and found no pertinent answer. upon seeing it there was no sense of panic, just wonder to what it was as it passed over my visual horizon.
content.summary: It literally looked like a twinkling star, just much larger
